name: Kill Crow
description:
Submission to Supersensory Megamix '21.

NOTE: This game make use of intense visual stimuli and loud sounds. If you're sensitive to bright flashes/colors, high pitched or irritating sounds, and/or have a history of epilepsy, please use caution or avoid playing this game!

Find 11 items, click to collect them. Click down the path to progress, click on the bottom part of the path on screen 2 to return. The items on the right indicate what still needs to be found.

Right click to turn off easy mode.

Created by Charly Taylor, Anders Taylor

Please consider donating :)

Sound FX from zapsplat.com and freesound.org
